HouseSubDesc11: Policy is designed to compensate your financial losses due to an accidental damage to your house and its contents.
Damagecases: Fire, Smoke, explosion, lightning, Earthquake, Storm and Flood.
Bursting: Bursting or overflowing of water tanks, apparatus or pipes.
Impactcollision: Impact or collision involving vehicles, aircrafts or articles dropped therefrom.
AdditionalCoverages: Additional Coverages (to be added upon request):
BreakageoffixedGlass: Breakage of fixed Glass and Sanitary fixtures
PublicLiability: Public Liability as owner of property
LossofRent: Loss of Rent and alternative housing.
Advantages_I1: All of our products are compliant with the Islamic Sharia Law
